nodes.bodyText: Do we need this constant?

Nope :-)
Removed
The ByteArrayFileCache is now available in OHC. Please revert this change.
Done. I got ClassNotFoundExceptions for my last update, this is why I added it originally. Looks like my 3.0 snapshot was too old then.
Please remove this class. It is not needed anymore because it is available in OHC.
